attributes.additional_details:
This is a lifeline for many Windsor residents - there is only one bank open in the whole town 
People come into town to go to the Post office - reducing footfall will add to shop closures and hence is very short sighted 
Reduced numbers of tourists visiting the high st 
There are other options to consider such as Royal support or take over by the local community
attributes.background: Windsor Post office is part of historic Windsor, tourists often going there after visiting the castle.  It is a key lifeline for many Windsor residents.  Windsor castle appears on stamps and it is the home to our Royal family.  Closing this Post office without considering other options is a mistake.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
